attributes.background: To debate, with a view to holding a national referendum, on the re-introduction of the death penalty where crimes of murder are proven beyond all reasonable doubt.

rejection.details:
Petitions need to call on the Government or Parliament to take a specific action.

It's not clear if you want the Government to reintroduce the death penalty, hold a referendum on reintroducing the death penalty, or something else.

You could start a new petition explaining clearly what you would like the Government or Parliament to do.

We have published the following petition, which you might like to sign:

Bring back the death penalty for certain offences including murder: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/585532
